title: InstrumentationFrameworkDescription
description: A generic description of an instrumentation framework.

name.description: The name of the instrumentation framework

existing.description: Whether the instrumentation framework is already installed

enabled_metrics.description: Whether metrics export is enabled for the instrumentation framework

enabled_traces.description: Whether traces export is enabled for the instrumentation framework

enabled_logs.description: Whether log export is enabled for the instrumentation framework

framework_options.description: Map of options, specific to the instrumentation framework, which should be passed to the agent.
